title: 5.3 Update Stuck at 33% with 13k+ files calculated
body:
OK so i've tried to update normally.
I've tried ritos repair option.
I've restarted my pc.
I've deleted the solutions&releases folders
I've tried opening as admin.

This is getting really bloody annoying. I've spent basically the whole day trying to get the bloody patch to work and every time it just "calculates differences" to infinity.

replies.body:
Have you tried reinstalling the entire game? Sometimes this problems stems from a corrupt file that the repair function fails to recognise.

I know.

Don't forget humans are also flawed.
Having the same problem except I made it to stage 2/2 which then gets stuck at 44pct never to move up again...
